pullrequest.title: per issue #194, alternative solution, add ROS service, allowing user to change joint damping with hard coded per joint bounds

content.raw:
This pull request is about offering the capability to set CFM damping via a ROS service call. 

Please use issue #194 for further discussion about what the limits should or should not be, and also use that forum to discuss the possibility of including Chris's Method 1 as a future pull-request.
content.html:
This pull request is about offering the capability to set CFM damping via a ROS service call.

Please use issue #194 for further discussion about what the limits should or should not be, and also use that forum to discuss the possibility of including Chris's Method 1 as a future pull-request.
